verses.content: Inhal puma ruoiṭhe rawpna insûng nêk chun, Lungdamtaka bu bâr khat fâkna a ṭha lem.
Siehlaw vartaka thaw hlaktu chun naupa, inzakna intlun hlaktu, chunga chun rorêl a tih. Unauhai laiah rochan nei bawk a tih.
Rawtuina bêl chu tangkaruo ta ding a na, pûm mei chu rângkachak ta ding a nih, LALPA ruok chun lungril a fie hlak.
Thil suol thawtu chun hmûr khawhlohai chu a ngaisak a, Chun mi khêlinhlip chun lei pawitâwk tieng chun na a sit.
Tukhawm mi pasie nuisan chun a siemtu a hmusit a nih. Vângduoina diriemtu chu hrem lo ni naw nih.
Nauhai nauhai chu mi upahai lallukhum an na, Chun, nauhai ropuina chu an pahai chu an nih.
Thuhril ṭhatak le invêt ân mawi ngai nawh a, Hmûr khêlinhlip chu lal nau leh ân mawi naw nâwk zuol.
Thamna hi a neitu ta ding chun mithaia lung hlutak ang a na, Ân her vêlna taphawta chun a hlawtling hlak.
Bawsietna inkhumtu chun hmangaina a zawng a, Thil hril hriltu ruok chun ṭhien bul a ṭhe.
Kâwkna hi hrietna nei mia chun a lût thûk lem, Invêt vawi za khat vuok nêk hmanin.
Mi rilo chun hêlna chau a zawng a, Chuleiin, ama kuoma chun mitir nunsetak tir nîng a tih.
Invêt ân vêt laia intuokpui nêk chun, Savawmpui a tehai inrûkpêka um intuokpui nuom a um lem.
Tukhawm thil ṭha aia thil ṭha naw pe lem chu, Thil ṭha naw a ina inthawkin fe hmang ngai naw nih.
Insuolna hung inṭan dân hi miin tui a hersuok ang chau a nih, Chuleiin, inhalna chu insuolna a um hmain mâksan rawh.
Mi khawhlo chu thiem inchangtir a, mi fel chu thiemnaw inchangtir chu, Chu ve vehai chu angkhata LALPA ta dinga tirdakum a nih.
Hrietthiemna a nei naw chun, Varna inchâwkna man ding invêt kuta chun ieng dingin am um a ta?
Ṭhien chun ieng lai khawmin a hmangai a, Unau chu lunginzîng ni dinga pieng a nih.
Mi hrietthiemna nei lo chun a kuthai a ben a, A tuolbâwm hmaihmaa chun mawphurtu a hung ni hlak.
Bawsietna ngainatu chun inhalna khawm a ngaina a, A dâi kawtkhâr dawm sângtu chun sietna a zawng a nih.
Lungril chapo neitu chun thil ṭha a hmu ngai nawh a, Lei khêlinhlip neitu chu pawitâwknaah a tlu lût hlak.
Nau invêt neitu chun a lungngaina chau dinga nei a na, Chun, invêt pa chun hlimna a nei bawk nawh.
Lungril hlim chu damdawi ṭha a na, Lungril serawp ruok chun ruhai a sukṭâwl.
Mi khawhlo chun ângsûnga inthawkin thilthlâwnpêk chu a lâk a, Rorêlna lampuihai chu a sukkâwi hlak.
Varna chu hrietthiemna neitu hmaihmaa chun a um a, Invêt mithai ruok chu leihnuoi tâwpa chun an um.
Naupa invêt chu a pa ta dinga lunginrimna a na, A neitu nu ta ding chun rimsikna a nih.
Mi fel inchawitir chu a ṭha nawh a, Mi ṭha an tluongna leia vuok khawm chu a ṭha chuong nawh.
A thuhai hla tâwk nei mi chun hrietthiemna a nei a, Lungril dei nei mi chu hrietthiemna nei mi a nih.
Invêt khawm, a to ṭawk lai chun mi vara ngai a na, A hmûrhai ân chip tlat lai chun mi var anga ngai a nih.
